basic.description: An investigation of some moral issues arising in connection with health care, including: the relationship between patient and health care provider; reproductive decision-making; euthanasia and the nature of death; and the development of health care policy.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Bioethics

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    (Completed 60.0 or more units) or (Registration in a Faculty of Medicine Plan).
One-way exclusion    May not be taken with or after PHIL247.
